column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place is just so dependable. I often venture here for dinner with out of town guests (many from NYC) and they all love it! The atmosphere is wonderful
column3: and the menu has something for everyone (it is of course tapas!)
column4: and none of it disappoints. The service is typically excellent as well. The only reason I give 4 stars rather than 5 is because of all of Chicago's fabulous restaurants
column5: nothing on the menu here is out of this world memorable
column6: but again it's all very good! Prices are also quite reasonable.
